name: Menage a Trois
description:
Sol Fitzroy is a gloomy girl starting college at her parent’s behest. She expects nothing from the prestigious Ivy University, but with soccer sweetheart Chet Chester and football star Bill Lowman, Sol might have a good time in the end.

As Chet encounters hostile teammates and Bill deals with his father’s expectations, Sol makes a realization of her own. Menage a Trois is a LGBTQ+ visual novel with an established relationship, an all-American football star, and many cute scenes.

Features

  • Kinetic novel with around 1-3 hours of playtime
  • Playable on PC, Mac, and Android
  • Bonus artbook with a $5 or above donation, including game art, illustrations, and sketches
Credits
  • Royalty-free music from Tim Beek
  • Save icon from Graphik Designz
  • Campus photo: G. Edward Johnson CC BY 4.0
  • Lounge photo: Weinberg Memorial Library (UofS) CC BY 2.0
  • Porch photo: vastateparksstaff CC BY 2.0
  • Mall photos: Phillip Pessar CC BY 2.0
  • Remaining backgrounds: PxHere and Pexels
Content warnings
  • Mentioned parental neglect, implied homophobia, unintentional misgendering

Presskit

Play the prequel for Sol and Chet's high school life and the sequel for their domestic life!
